get.summary: Returns the groups associated with a workspace.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Groups of the specified workspace returned successfully.

post.summary: Create a new subgroup for a workspace

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

409.description: Subgroup with this name already exists

post.summary: Adds users to the workspace by id.

uids.description: Represents the user uids to add to the workspace.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Confirmation message indicating that users have been added successfully.

404.description: User not found in the instance.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: uids[]
parameters.description: Represents the user uids to remove to the workspace.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

204.description: Confirmation for users removed from the workspace.

404.description: User not found in the instance.

post.summary: Add user as a workspace manager

uid.description: Represents the user uid to add as a workspace manager.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Confirmation for users added to the workspace.

404.description: User not found in the instance.

delete.summary: Remove user as a workspace manager

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Represents the user uid to remove as a workspace manager.

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

404.description: User not found in the instance.
